com.radirius.mercury.graphics

Class Batcher.VertexData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.Batcher.VertexData
  • Enclosing class:
    Batcher

    public static class Batcher.VertexData
extends Object
    A class to hold the data of a vertex (position, color, and source coordinates).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Batcher.VertexData(float x, float y, float r, float g, float b, float a, float u, float v) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Batcher.VertexData

        public Batcher.VertexData(float x,
                  float y,
                  float r,
                  float g,
                  float b,
                  float a,
                  float u,
                  float v)
        Parameters:
        x - The x position
        y - The y position
        r - The red value of the color of the vertex (0.0-1.0)
        g - The green value of the color of the vertex (0.0-1.0)
        b - The blue value of the color of the vertex (0.0-1.0)
        a - The alpha value of the color of the vertex (0.0-1.0)
        u - The source x coordinate
        v - The source y coordinate
